name: Exoria
description:
“An archipelago of mystery and adventure, inspire a god to return and show them your worth. Unlock the secrets of the world with your angry companion and discover the truth of the world's lost tribes.”

A 3rd-person adventure and puzzle game taking influence from games such as RiME and the Zelda series, Exoria will see the player discover a forgotten island and enjoy the beginning of a grand quest.

Developed for the Game Design and Development module at Abertay University in Dundee, Scotland
